languages.text: All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the character is increased by +3% until the end of combat for every new enemy damaged by them this combat.
languages.original_text: Весь наносимый персонажем {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} до конца боя увеличивается на 3% за каждого противника, которому этот персонаж нанес урон.

traits.locale_text: All damage dealt by the character is increased by +5% until the end of combat for every new enemy damaged by them this combat.

languages.text: Todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido por el personaje aumenta un 3 % hasta el final del combate por cada nuevo enemigo al que daña durante este combate.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the character is increased by +3% until the end of combat for every new enemy damaged by them this combat.

traits.locale_text: Todo el daño infligido por el personaje aumenta un 5 % hasta el final del combate por cada nuevo enemigo al que daña durante este combate.

languages.text: このキャラクターが与えるあらゆる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、この戦闘でダメージが与えられた敵1体につき戦闘終了まで+3%増加する。
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the character is increased by +3% until the end of combat for every new enemy damaged by them this combat.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターが与えるあらゆる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、この戦闘でダメージが与えられた敵1体につき戦闘終了まで+3%増加する。

languages.text: 本场战斗中，此角色每对一名新的敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，此角色造成的所有伤害就提高3%，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the character is increased by +3% until the end of combat for every new enemy damaged by them this combat.

traits.locale_text: 本场战斗中，此角色每对一名新的敌人造成伤害，此角色造成的所有伤害就提高5%，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Der gesamte vom Charakter verursachte {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes für jeden neuen Gegner, dem er in diesem Kampf Schaden zufügt, um +3 % erhöht.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the character is increased by +3% until the end of combat for every new enemy damaged by them this combat.

traits.locale_text: Der gesamte vom Charakter verursachte Schaden wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes für jeden neuen Gegner, dem er in diesem Kampf Schaden zufügt, um +5% erhöht.

languages.text: Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par le personnage augmentent de +3 % jusqu'à la fin du combat pour chaque nouvel ennemi auquel il inflige des dégâts au cours de ce combat.
languages.original_text: All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by the character is increased by +3% until the end of combat for every new enemy damaged by them this combat.

traits.locale_text: Tous les dégâts infligés par le personnage augmentent de +5 % jusqu'à la fin du combat pour chaque nouvel ennemi auquel il inflige des dégâts au cours de ce combat.

languages.text: Karakterin vereceği tüm {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, o çatışmada hasar verdiği her yeni düşman için +%3 artar. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
